xdb
Class xmlDriverImpl

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--xdb.xmlDriverImpl
public class xmlDriverImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements xmlDriver

This is a full implementation of the XDB driver interface.

For support of different underlying technologies, several packages are needed:

  • com.sun.xml.tree (only if the default documentProxy used): DOM1, XML1, DTD
  • org.w3c.dom: DOM1
  • com.jclark.xsl.dom: DOM1, XSLT1

Version:
1.0
Author:
Phoyh
